scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../../FullStackOpen/part3/frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse C:/Users/prota/FullStackOpen/FullStackOpen_part3/backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
